problem.p: This is a concept question, provided to check your understanding of the previous lecture video clips.
Which of the following are true?

choice.text: The five-qubit code encodes two logical qubits.
The five-qubit code has five generators.
[mathjaxinline]{XXXXX}[/mathjaxinline] is not in the stabilizer group of the five qubit code.
The logical [mathjaxinline]|1\rangle[/mathjaxinline] qubit in this code is stabilized by [mathjaxinline]-ZZZZZ[/mathjaxinline].
